86280.召喚士リンジャーラから \n我が主に 招待状が届いたのは\nほんの２日前のことだ:
It was just two days ago that my lord received
any invitation from the summoner
Linjara.

86281.招待状には 復興した海洋都市リンジャハルを\nぜひ見にきてほしい と書かれており:
The invitation said to come and see the
revived city of Linjahar. My lord's face lit
up as he gazed at the city from afar.

86282.中央塔に着くと おふたりは\n学徒の頃に戻ったように 軽口をたたき合い\n無邪気:
After arriving at the central tower, the two
of you talked like the days from your youth.
The summer breeze carried your laughter.

86283.リンジャーラは 宝珠のことを気にしているのか\nこの借りは いつか必ず返す と言:
Linjara was perhaps concerned about the jewel,
and said he would repay the debt someday. My
lord cares little of lending and borrowing...

86284.しばらく歓談した後 リンジャーラは仕事に戻り\n主と私は リンジャハル名物の魚料:
After chatting for awhile, Linjara returned to his work. My lord and I headed to a restaurant in town to try one of Linjahar's
famous fish dishes.

86285.その店で 私たちは 偶然にも\n近頃 失踪する住民が 急増しているという\n気に:
It was there that we happened to hear a
disturbing rumor about a recent spike in the
number of missing citizens...
